meanings.definition: The art or practice of creating portraits.
meanings.sent1: She studied portraiture in art class.
meanings.sent2: The museum had a special exhibit on portraiture.
meanings.sent3: The robot tried its hand at portraiture, painting funny faces on everyone.
meanings.sent4: Her words were a vivid portraiture of the bustling city life.
meanings.sent5: The artist's portraiture captured the essence of each subject perfectly.

meanings.sent1: He hung his latest portraiture on the gallery wall.
meanings.sent2: The family commissioned a portraiture of their beloved pet.
meanings.sent3: The comedian's hilarious portraiture of the president had everyone laughing.
meanings.sent4: The book's detailed descriptions were a portraiture of the characters' personalities.
meanings.sent5: The photographer's portraiture revealed the inner beauty of each individual.
